paragraphs.body: Does your fanon feel a little dull with text alone? Wish you had more "life" to your words? Ever wondered what it'd be like to actually see your beloved characters?
paragraphs.text: Does your fanon feel a little dull with text alone? Wish you had more "life" to your words? Ever wondered what it'd be like to actually see your beloved characters?

paragraphs.body: No worries, the Fanon Illustrator Insignia is right here!
paragraphs.text: No worries, the Fanon Illustrator Insignia is right here!

paragraphs.body: The FII is a group sporting skilled illustrators who will create custom, self-made pictures for your fanon upon request. Don't hesitate to ask, because there's no limit to how many you can request! Our work includes screenshot-style images, titlecards, separate character portraits, or a combination. You may scroll down to drop your fanon's name and a link to your story under one of the group member's schedules. Once your request is carried out, we'll notify you shortly and send it over for your free use. We promise your fanon will look awesome with the addition of our artwork - though its success still depends on your writing quality.

We promise your fanon will look awesome with the addition of our artwork - though its success still depends on your writing quality.

paragraphs.body:
Resignation 
Balancing real life and Avatar Wiki activities can be very hard and challenging. Unfortunately, studies will become to stressful for some of us illustrators. We know how you feel. If other obligations demand your attention, don't hesitate to step down from illustrations if they're a burden. However, you are expected to adhere to the following guidelines if you choose to resign:

paragraphs.body: After that, you're good to go! Page updating will be taken care of accordingly. If you have an emergency that includes or that will result in leaving the FII, exceptions can be made to the above rules.

paragraphs.body: Show off your artist pride! Feel free to copy/paste {{User Fanon Illustrator Insignia}} to your user profile after you've officially joined the crew.
paragraphs.text: Show off your artist pride! Feel free to copy/paste {{User Fanon Illustrator Insignia}} to your user profile after you've officially joined the crew.

paragraphs.body: There are currently no open spots available in the Fanon Illustrator Insignia. However, if you love drawing, are comfortable with custom requests, and wish to help bring Avatar Wiki's fanons to life, we encourage you to check periodically! See the membership request page ${link_0}.
